entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
Pack those bags because your next vacation is one nonstop flight away! 😎🧳

📸: dylank photography https://t.co/Ap0ht472WO

While working his 276th flight with Allegiant, Eli noticed an incredible coincidence when he saw the aircraft number!

Coincidence or fate? You decide! https://t.co/UJIf3WhwF3

Meet Morgan and her sister, Hailey, two adorable little girls who melted the hearts of our entire crew. After the other passengers exited our plane, Morgan and Hailey had a little fun in the flight deck and before saying goodbye, Morgan asked for a photo with all her new friends. https://t.co/Y1BmbP9mHm

Loving this sun-kissed summer glow.

📸: abe.spotting https://t.co/2KL5WuRGeI

Can you think of a sweeter way to celebrate #NationalSugarCookieDay?

Special thanks to Roni's Cookie Cupboard in Provo for its incredible creation! https://t.co/5jUwWVrhXF

Your window seat is waiting! 

Our annual See America Sale is happening now only at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu. 

📸: crakeprods https://t.co/ityrXlMYty

data.text: It's a beautiful day to celebrate the red, white, and blue. #HappyFourthOfJuly https://t.co/dRwScR7uj2

It's go time!

📸: msp_plane_spotter https://t.co/bac0kxPbKU

Skip the layover. #GoNonstop

📸: metalbirdspotter https://t.co/HAFwd30o6U

School's out: 
A: For summer 😎
B. For...ever 🎓
C. School? I can't even remember that far back. 🤷

Congrats to all the grads! #TimeToCelebrate #ClassOf2022 https://t.co/O51sW0Q44a
A perfect moment on a perfect day! 🌈 https://t.co/eio1wxTQGd

data.text:
To celebrate his retirement, Captain Harry had a special copilot by his side - his son, Vincent.

"...watching him set the parking brake for the last time with Allegiant was emotional because I know how much flying means to him.” – Vincent

 Like father, like son. #FathersDay https://t.co/IFfDstIVA3

The Allegiant team is officially 5,000 strong! #TogetherWeFly

Interested in joining our team? Apply today at https://t.co/S5Vg9VxnN9. https://t.co/63qmCYm1Tn

data.text:
If it takes three great white sharks to equal the length of a megalodon - the largest shark to ever live - how many megalodons does it take to equal the length of an A320?

Two. It only takes two. 😲

Happy #NationalMegalodonDay.

📸: kmaviation https://t.co/wltVC5KNgU

Did you know the air you breathe on board is completely replaced every three minutes? #TheMoreYouKnow

📸: travelwmase https://t.co/LnjMgrfj5I

Summer adventures await. 😎

📸: 757usairways https://t.co/RGfhSf7wGY

data.text:
Today is #WorldOceansDay. It's a day when people around our planet celebrate and honor the great blue ocean that connects us all. 🌊

How are you celebrating the ocean this summer?

📸: irwin.nick https://t.co/HB6XN3rR4A

"I wouldn’t trade my days in aviation for anything, I’m so blessed each and every day I get to wear this uniform. 💕"

- Jessica, Allegiant Flight Attendant https://t.co/WG594itKQX

Summer vibes only. 😎

📸: indyflight https://t.co/YUwaMDaBi1

Each time our flight attendants don their Allegiant wings, they dedicate themselves to serving our passengers, keeping everyone safe, and spreading a little sunshine along the way. 🌞

To flight attendants everywhere, we wish you a wonderful #FlightAttendantAppreciationDay. https://t.co/seVEAHax1N
Today we honor those who made the ultimate sacrifice. https://t.co/fM9CuTevni

entity.name: NFL Schedule Release 2022
entity.description: The 2022 NFL schedule will be released on Thursday, May 12. The season will kick off on Thursday, September 8. Keep here for the latest updates.

data.text:
🏈 The 2022 - 2023 football schedule is officially out, so you're on the clock to score the best deals on travel packages for games at @AllegiantStadm! 🏈

Get your flights, hotel, game tickets and more now only at https://t.co/Z48IktK9Yu.

📸: @Raiders https://t.co/uYz2taZdq1

Allegiant couldn't operate without the dedicated members of our team who begin their workday at nightfall and head home at sunrise.

The next time you travel, be sure to remember the "third shift." Their hard work is vital to each and every flight. #NationalThirdShiftWorkersDay https://t.co/BWTopuZKt7

Nonstop > Layovers

Plain and simple. Who's with us? 🙋‍♀️🙋‍♂️

📸: rishalpdx https://t.co/JGF7FYGM3e

data.text: One thing's for sure - the Bad Guys made the ultimate getaway. See how they took to the skies on a very special Allegiant aircraft in honor of @Dreamworks' "The Bad Guys" with a sneak peek from our team. And don't forget to see the movie, which is in theaters now! #TheBadGuys https://t.co/OKCCJOyJMM
Say "hey" to our newest graduating class of Allegiant flight attendants! 👋🥳 https://t.co/MvAXuF3L2E

data.text: @fgwaterman Hi there! In the future, for your own personal security, please refrain from sharing your reservation information on public platforms. I see your request was handled via Twitter DM. Have a lovely day! -H

@IdyutUnicorn If you do each of these and still run into issues, you are always welcome to call 7025058888 and have a Customer Care agent assist you with your booking. I recommend calling during our non-peak hours 9pm to 4am. -H

@IdyutUnicorn Hi there. Typically, there are a few things you can do if you run into issues booking a reservation: Check with your bank to ensure they are not blocking the charge, clear your cache and cookies, try booking on a separate device, & try booking with a different email. -H

urls.title: Checked and Carry-on Bag Information | Allegiant Air
urls.description: Personal item, carry-on, and checked bag, allowance, dimension, and weight restriction information. Answers to commonly asked baggage related questions.

data.text: @beefquesarito Hi Jordan. Your skateboard must fit within the dimensions of a carry on 9 x 14 x 22 in order to be permitted as a carryon. https://t.co/4An4mQ067G -H
@iusuallynguyen Hi there! We apologize for the late response. If you need assistance, please send us a DM and the next available agent will assist you! https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -H

@CuevasEduardo Hi Eduardo! Try using a different device. Another recommendation is to delete the app and redownload it to ensure you have the latest version. If you need further assistance, send us a DM. https://t.co/VDWSImLSZC -H
